songs.lyrics:
Aah! Yama! Nasty!

[Verse 1]
Ahh! sabai ko thulo kura
Tara kaam vane kaile hunna pura
Aajkal mitra ni ke bhichitra
Mukh ma ramram bagali ma chura
Tara malai pani baal vo
Prithvi golo chha aaucha sabai ko paalo
Manchhe ko jaat chinna k garo vako
Bahira gahu-goro bhitra man k saaro kalo

[Chorus] x2
K vaako hola, K vaako hola
Rap hanchhas geda jasto k vaako hola
Geet pani geda jasto k gaako hola
Keta man naparey ni kina yesto gay vaako hola

[Verse 2]
Aajkal ko rap battle yani khulla manch ko bhela
Ek dui oota neta ani baki sabai jana bheda
Ma hun sabai ko guru sabai rapper mero chela
Ma sanga rap kakshya lina aaija bela bela
Talai tyehi ni thik chha
Video banais keti nachais la babu thik chha
Nepal jasto desh ma je paye tyehi ni bikchha
Tara ta jasto hawa sanga kasle rap sikchha
Yeso alikati rapper huna jan
Tero rap sunda dukchha hami sabai ko kaan
Na jhad dherai saan, kura maan
Talai dhuwa jasto udai dinchhu dhumrapan
Chhaina kunai saan tero asli rapper majh
Tero video jata tattai lagchha overblast
Tara thikai ho desh vari chha namarda ko raaj
Kati keti matra nachauchas aaba afu pani naach

[Chorus] x2
K vaako hola, K vaako hola
Rap hanchhas geda jasto k vaako hola
Geet pani geda jasto k gaako hola
Keta man naparey ni kina yesto gay vaako hola

[Verse 3]
Yo ho rap ko ranabhumi gari aaija tayari
Sabai lai sabda le prahar chha astra ko bhakari
Dherai ufrine lai pachadi, kasailai ni nachadi
Ek saas ma nilera janchhu ma nadakari
Malai ramro lagchha Yodda, Bidesh ani Cromblah
Brisk Timos, Nasty, Laure ani Trix baula
Aru sabai tori tah rapper pani haina
Timiharu ko geet ma tah kunai rapper pani chhaina
Kinaki testo hawa talko geet lai rap bhanidaina
Ani pose handaima matra kahile rapper banidaina
Hawa jasto paara tero dherai udhdaichas mora
Your father is back, aba runechas chora

[Chorus] x2
K vaako hola, K vaako hola
Rap hanchhas geda jasto k vaako hola
Geet pani geda jasto k gaako hola
Keta man naparey ni kina yesto gay vaako hola
songs.title: K Vaako Hola
